languages.text: Некоторое время спустя Ирлиэт приходит к Лорд-капитану — изможденная и потерянная. Она говорит о том, что отправилась на судне мон-кай во тьму в надежде отыскать собратьев, а нашла лишь трупы, погребенные человеческой ненавистью. И даже когда Лорд-капитан мог{mf||ла} помочь ее народу, элантах упрямо {mf|шел|шла} той же тропой, что и прочие мон-кай, нарушая договор. И свою часть договора эльдарка выполнять не намерена — сокровища детей Азуриана не достанутся {mf|тому|той}, кто их не достоин.

Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.
languages.original_text: Некоторое время спустя Ирлиэт приходит к Лорд-капитану — изможденная и потерянная. Она говорит о том, что отправилась на судне мон-кай во тьму в надежде отыскать собратьев, а нашла лишь трупы, погребенные человеческой ненавистью. И даже когда Лорд-капитан мог{mf||ла} помочь ее народу, элантах упрямо {mf|шел|шла} той же тропой, что и прочие мон-кай, нарушая договор. И свою часть договора эльдарка выполнять не намерена — сокровища детей Азуриана не достанутся {mf|тому|той}, кто их не достоин.

traits.locale_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin, but found only corpses, slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. And even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

languages.text: 过了一段时间之后，伊莉耶特回到了领主舰长身边，看起来憔悴而迷茫。她说，她登上了这艘猴子的舰船，驶入黑暗，就是希望能找到她的族人，但她所找到的一切，却只有族人的尸体，死在满怀恨意的人类手中。即便外界人明明有机会帮助她的族人，却还是固执地选择重蹈其他猴子的老路，违反了与她达成的协议。因此，她认为她不该继续履行她的承诺。阿苏焉之子的宝藏，绝不能落入那些不配拥有它的人手中。
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

traits.locale_text: 过了一段时间之后，伊莉耶特回到了领主舰长身边，看起来憔悴而迷茫。她说，她登上了这艘猴子的舰船，驶入黑暗，就是希望能找到她的族人，但她所找到的一切，却只有族人的尸体，死在满怀恨意的人类手中。即便外界人明明有机会帮助她的族人，却还是固执地选择重蹈其他猴子的老路，违反了与她达成的协议。因此，她认为她不该继续履行她的承诺。阿苏焉之子的宝藏，绝不能落入那些不配拥有它的人手中。

languages.text: それからしばらくして、ユリエットがやつれ、途方に暮れた様子でロード・キャプテンのもとを訪れた。彼女はモン＝ケイの船に乗り込み、キンを見つけようと暗闇の中へと旅立ったが、見つけたのは人類の憎しみによって虐殺された死体だけだったと言う。ロード・キャプテンが彼女の仲間を助ける機会があったときでさえ、エランタは頑なに他のモン＝ケイと同じ道をたどり、協定を破った。そのため、アエルダリも取引を守る必要などないと考えている。アシュリアンの御子の宝を、ふさわしくない者の手に渡す必要はないと。
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

traits.locale_text: それからしばらくして、ユリエットがやつれ、途方に暮れた様子でロード・キャプテンのもとを訪れた。彼女はモン＝ケイの船に乗り込み、キンを見つけようと暗闇の中へと旅立ったが、見つけたのは人類の憎しみによって虐殺された死体だけだったと言う。ロード・キャプテンが彼女の仲間を助ける機会があったときでさえ、エランタは頑なに他のモン＝ケイと同じ道をたどり、協定を破った。そのため、アエルダリも取引を守る必要などないと考えている。アシュリアンの御子の宝を、ふさわしくない者の手に渡す必要はないと。

languages.text: Poco después, Yrliet se presenta ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, demacrada y perdida. Dice que subió a bordo de la nave mon-keigh y se adentró en la oscuridad con la esperanza de encontrar a sus parientes, pero que solo encontró cadáveres masacrados por el odio de la Humanidad. Incluso cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tuvo la oportunidad de ayudar a su pueblo, {mf|el|la} elantach siguió obstinadamente el mismo camino que los demás mon-keigh, incumpliendo el acuerdo. Por ello, la Aeldari tampoco considera oportuno cumplir su parte del trato: los tesoros de los hijos de Asuryan no acabarán en manos de quienes no son dignos de ellos.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

traits.locale_text: Poco después, Yrliet se presenta ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, demacrada y perdida. Dice que subió a bordo de la nave mon-keigh y se adentró en la oscuridad con la esperanza de encontrar a sus parientes, pero que solo encontró cadáveres masacrados por el odio de la Humanidad. Incluso cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tuvo la oportunidad de ayudar a su pueblo, {mf|el|la} elantach siguió obstinadamente el mismo camino que los demás mon-keigh, incumpliendo el acuerdo. Por ello, la Aeldari tampoco considera oportuno cumplir su parte del trato: los tesoros de los hijos de Asuryan no acabarán en manos de quienes no son dignos de ellos.

languages.text: Nach einiger Zeit kommt Yrliet zum Lord Captain, verstört und verloren. Sie sagt, sie sei an Bord des Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffs gekommen und in die Dunkelheit ausgezogen, um ihre Verwandten zu finden, habe aber nur Leichen gefunden, vom Hass der Menschheit abgeschlachtet. Selbst als der Lord Captain die Gelegenheit hatte, ihrem Volk zu helfen, folgte der Elantach stur demselben Pfad wie die anderen Chem-Pan-Sey — und verstieß damit gegen ihre Abmachung. Die Aeldari sieht daher auch keinen Grund mehr, ihren Teil der Abmachung einzuhalten. Die Schätze der Kinder von Asuryan werden nicht in den Händen derer landen, die ihrer nicht würdig sind.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

traits.locale_text: Nach einiger Zeit kommt Yrliet zum Lord Captain, verstört und verloren. Sie sagt, sie sei an Bord des Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffs gekommen und in die Dunkelheit ausgezogen, um ihre Verwandten zu finden, habe aber nur Leichen gefunden, vom Hass der Menschheit abgeschlachtet. Selbst als der Lord Captain die Gelegenheit hatte, ihrem Volk zu helfen, folgte der Elantach stur demselben Pfad wie die anderen Chem-Pan-Sey — und verstieß damit gegen ihre Abmachung. Die Aeldari sieht daher auch keinen Grund mehr, ihren Teil der Abmachung einzuhalten. Die Schätze der Kinder von Asuryan werden nicht in den Händen derer landen, die ihrer nicht würdig sind.

languages.text: Un peu plus tard, Yrliet vient voir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneur-capitaine}, l'air hagard et perdu. Elle lui dit qu'elle s'est embarquée à son bord pour explorer les ténèbres dans l'espoir de renouer avec les siens, mais qu'en fin de compte, elle n'a trouvé qu'un monceau de cadavres sacrifiés sur l'autel de la haine de l'humanité. Et même quand l'elantach a eu l'occasion de leur venir en aide, {mf|il|elle} a continué à suivre aveuglément la voie tracée par les autres mon-keigh, au mépris de l'accord qui les liait. Par conséquent, rien ne l'oblige plus à honorer sa part du marché : les trésors des enfants d'Asuryan ne tomberont pas entre les mains de misérables qui s'en sont montrés indignes.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.

traits.locale_text: Un peu plus tard, Yrliet vient voir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneur-capitaine}, l'air hagard et perdu. Elle lui dit qu'elle s'est embarquée à son bord pour explorer les ténèbres dans l'espoir de renouer avec les siens, mais qu'en fin de compte, elle n'a trouvé qu'un monceau de cadavres sacrifiés sur l'autel de la haine de l'humanité. Et même quand l'elantach a eu l'occasion de leur venir en aide, {mf|il|elle} a continué à suivre aveuglément la voie tracée par les autres mon-keigh, au mépris de l'accord qui les liait. Par conséquent, rien ne l'oblige plus à honorer sa part du marché : les trésors des enfants d'Asuryan ne tomberont pas entre les mains de misérables qui s'en sont montrés indignes.

languages.text: Yrliet, bir süre sonra bezgin ve dalgın bir hâlde Lord Kaptan'ın yanına geliyor. Soydaşlarını bulma umuduyla bu mon-keigh gemisine binmiş ama sadece İnsanlığın nefretle katlettiği cesetler bulmuş diye anlatıyor. Lord Kaptan'ın eline Yrliet'in halkına yardım etme fırsatı geçtiğinde bile elantach, ısrarla diğer mon-keighlerle aynı yolu izleyip anlaşmayı ihlal etti. Bu yüzden Aeldari de verdiği sözü tutmayı uygun bulmuyor... Asuryan'ın Çocuklarının hazineleri, hak etmeyen birisinin eline düşmeyecek.
languages.original_text: Some time after, Yrliet comes to the Lord Captain, haggard and lost. She says that she came aboard the mon-keigh vessel and set off into the darkness in the hopes of finding her kin but found only corpses slaughtered by Humanity's hatred. Even when the Lord Captain had the opportunity to help her people, the elantach obstinately followed the same path as the other mon-keigh, breaching the agreement. As such, the Aeldari does not see it fit to keep up her end of the bargain either — the treasures of the Children of Asuryan will not end up in the hands of those who are not worthy of them.
